items.body: In my view, this should read: "Active in the Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia."
Only a few hundreds of protocols are in English
Unfortunately the personal names were deleted from the typed and the scanned version too
and in the YIVO Archives, New York, mainly the English and German, and Yiddish versions
The contributor's name is Stephen **Manheimer**. Source: Stephen Manheimer via EHRI portal feedback.
The structure will change

Die Fa. Messerschmitt betrieb in Kottern (auch?) einen Werkzeugbau, welcher Vorrichtungen für die verschiedenen Fertigungsbetriebe der Fertigungskreise Augsburg und Regensburg herstellte. So lieferte "Kottern" in den Jahren 1944 und 1945 auch Vorrichtungen für das streng geheime unterirdische Flugzeug-Montagewerk "Bergkristall" in St. Georgen/Gusen (KZ Gusen II) wo für den Fertigungskreis Regensburg auf einer Art Fließband bis zu 450 voll ausgestattete Rümpfe pro Monat (März 1945) für das Düsenjagdflugzeug Me-262 hergestellt wurden.
EHRI Document Blog: see Jakub Leipzig Interview: https://blog.ehri-project.eu/2017/01/23/jakub-leipzig-interview-jewish-displacement-in-italy-through-its-documents/
This link appears to have been removed from the USHMM collections search
Can someone please help me find these ?  I can't seem to find any of these testimonies it's unspeakably frustrating
NB: This text, as of 5th Sept 2017, contains two misspellings of "Toch" as "Koch".
Second line of this text should be "She had come over earlier in 1939"
Working link: http://www.albarchive.gov.al/
Anna Dajtrowska zmarła w 1980 roku
page no longer exists; main page has been moved to https://www.oorlogsbronnen.nl/

This is the wrong name of the collection. It should be Židovska, not Jevreji. The original name is: "Matice u ratu palih i u povodu za taj preminulih – ŽIDOVI” http://www.daz.hr/vodic/site/article/ostale-knjige

Digitalisat des Mikrofilms im Archiv der Arolsen Archives: https://collections.arolsen-archives.org/de/archive/7-6-1_11000001 (das Bundesarchiv hat die Aufzeichnungen derzeit nicht digitalisiert in invenio)
